pfch.pages.basepage.dialog.tab.advanced..sling:message: Only applicable for Content Pages, News Pages, Wall Page, Article Pages and Learning Path Pages
If checked the page will be ignored by the Site Search.
If checked the page will be listed as top result in the site search result and autocomplete.
If checked the page will be ignored by External Search engines

pfch.pages.dialog.tab.advanced.pushchat..sling:message: Activate a push chat on this page. Please note that site configurations apply.

pfch.pages.languagepage.dialog.tab.basic.sling:message: The technical name of the page which is part of the URL and must follow the ISO standards, e.g. 'de' for the German language page (all lowercase).
Is shown in language switch in the footer, e.g: Deutsch
Is shown in language switch in the mobile header, e.g: De

pfch.pages.homepage.dialog.tab.configura.sling:message: Reference a Configuration Template: Footer Configuration. The Footer Configuration is inherited by all descendant pages.

pfch.pages.contentpage.description.sling:message: Standard template for all conent pages, e.g. product pages

pfch.pages.staticcontentpage.description.sling:message: Static content page without header and footer

pfch.pages.searchresultpage.description.sling:message: Search Result page to display search results and filters to narrow down search results

pfch.pages.siteconfigurationpage.descrip.sling:message: This template is used to create a site configuration page. Those pages let editors configure certain aspects of the underlying page like the logo, header and footer component.

pfch.components.articlecolumns.descripti.sling:message: Grid component with two columns for holding: Article Title, Article Text, Article Image, Article Lists

pfch.components.articleheader.descriptio.sling:message: Article Header is a fixed component on article pages

pfch.components.configurationbasepage.de.sling:message: The configuration base page is extended by all configuration pages and provides the basic functionality needed by configuration pages.

pfch.components.header.description.sling:message: Parent element to include all header elements

pfch.components.mobileheader.description.sling:message: Parent element to include the elements of the mobile header menu

pfch.components.breadcrumb.description.sling:message: Displays the user's current position in the website hierarchy

pfch.components.mainnavigation.descripti.sling:message: Main navigation elements of the header

pfch.components.metanavigation.descripti.sling:message: One level navigation giving access to the different first level pages

pfch.components.mobilenavigation.descrip.sling:message: Combines Meta Navigation and Top Navigation for mobile devices

pfch.components.footer.description.sling:message: Parent element to include all footer elements

pfch.components.footercontact.descriptio.sling:message: A teaser to show different contact options

pfch.components.footersocial.description.sling:message: Links to the PostFinance social network appearances

pfch.components.footersocialconfiguratio.sling:message: Links to the PostFinance social network appearances
The label is read by screen readers and is not visible
Depending on the selected Network a CSS class will be set which renders the logo of the network
URL to the page of the social network

pfch.components.headeralertmessage.dialo.sling:message: Background color of the alert box.

pfch.components.footernavigation.dialog..sling:message: Add Co-Browsing link to the end of the list
The Co-Browsing link is only rendered on big viewports and when Co-Browsing is enabled. The link label can be set in the Site Configuration for Co-Browsing.

pfch.components.navigationconfiguration..sling:message: Pages below this path are used to generate the Meta Navigation, Main Navigation and Mobile Navigation.
Label which replaces the logo image when the user scrolls down the page.
Show site context in page header with an optional link
Info text to help the author understanding the context.
This text is read by the screenreader as description for the Meta Navigation.
This text is read by the screenreader as description for the Main Navigation.

Visually hidden description for reaching the end of the current selected Main Navigation items. Must be read after the last navigation element has been skipped and does link back to the related 1st level navigation label.
This text is read by the screenreader as description for the Mobile Navigation.
This text is read by the screenreader as description of the button, which opens the mobile header menu.
This text is read by the screenreader as description of the button, which closes the mobile header menu.
This text is read by the screenreader as description language switch feature in the mobile header menu.
This text is read by the screenreader as description for the selected navigation item.
Visually hidden description for the breadcrumb.
E-Finance Login Button in page header. Default value is: Login
Back to E-Finance Button in page header. Default value is: E-Finance
E-Finance Logout Button in page header. Default value is: Logout

pfch.components.activealerts.description.sling:message: Maps the defined alerts with pages

pfch.components.activealerts.dialog.tab..sling:message: This text is read by the screen reader to describe the context of the elements and is not visible on the page.

pfch.components.footercontactconfigurati.sling:message: Container for up to 3 Footer Contact Teaser

pfch.components.logoconfiguration.descri.sling:message: Configuration component to configure the page logo.

pfch.components.submenuconfiguration.des.sling:message: The sub menu is part of the main navigation. It is optional and displayed in the right column of the main navigation flyout.

pfch.components.submenuconfiguration.dia.sling:message: This text is read by the screenreader as description for the Sub Menu Navigation.

pfch.components.mobilelanguagemenu.descr.sling:message: The mobile language links are displayed inside the mobile header menu.

pfch.components.pagelead.description.sling:message: Leadtext with optional icon image and/or CTA button

pfch.pages.folder.description.sling:message: Blank page that acts as folder

pfch.components.footerlanguage.descripti.sling:message: Renders the language navigation in the footer.

Leave empty to use the Cost Center as defined by the Order Type

pfch.components.relatedarticles.descript.sling:message: Shows articles cards related to the current article page

pfch.components.relatedarticles.dialog.t.sling:message: Shows related Article Cards. Related articles are picked by same content tags, average rating and category.

pfch.components.abntesting.dialog.tab.ge.sling:message: All settings are made in the Variant Component

pfch.components.abntestingvariant.dialog.sling:message: Name the variant by its use case. Field is required.
Defines the distribution rate in relation to the other variants. Usually a value of 1 for all variants is fine to have an equal distribution.

pfch.components.videochat.tab.availabili.sling:message: On update usually needs update on field: Waiting - additional info.

pfch.components.pagerating.dialog.descri.sling:message: Shows the current page rating, allows visitors to rate a page, allows editors to reset the page rating.

pfch.components.pagerating.dialog.tab.ge.sling:message: All settings are made in the global configurations. Use the filter-star icon in the component toolbar to reset all ratings for this page.

Page Rating and Social Sharing Links Structure

pfch.components.socialsharinglinks.dialo.sling:message: Visitor can share a page on social media like Twitter, Facebook, WhatsApp and by mail.

pfch.pages.socialsharingconfigurationpag.sling:message: The Template Element: Social Sharing Links Configuration contains global sharing configurations. Here the editors define the label 'Beitrag teilen' (EN: Share) and also enable or disable the sharing functionality for the current site and language.

pfch.components.socialsharingconfigurati.sling:message: Global configuration for Social Sharing Links
These texts are not visible.They are read by the screen reader to allow blind people to use the social sharing links

pfch.components.sociallinkconfiguration..sling:message: Configuration for one Social Sharing Link

The placeholder %s (externalized URL) may be used to include the absolute URL of the page to be shared Example: https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=%s The placeholder %t may be used to include the title of the page to be shared inside the URL. Example: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=%s

pfch.components.socialsharingconfigurati.sling:message: Target link for the social sharing link with optional placeholders

pfch.components.sociallinkconfiguration..sling:message: Show the social sharing link on mobile viewports only

pfch.components.contenthubconfiguration..sling:message: Configuration of a Content Hub, which covers wall page, article pages and learning path pages
Renders the alt attribute. Leave this field empty to use the 'Alternative Text' value from the DAM Asset Metadata.
Defines the available filters for the wall page. Please only select one tag.
These texts are not visible. They are read by the screen reader to allow blind people to use the article search.

pfch.components.searchresult.dialog.tab..sling:message: This option enables a list a list of top rated articles.

Only the first 2 Active CTAs will be displayed.
Renders the alt attribute. Leave this field empty to use the 'Alternative Text' value from the DAM Asset Metadata.

Aria Label for next slide button

pfch.components.carousel.dialog.tab.gene.sling:message: All settings are made in the Content Carousel Slide components
Image slide consists of image and subtitle (optional). Text Image slide consists of image, image subtitle (optional), title and richtext (optional).
Optional Subtitle for the image defined at the image tab.
This section is valid for Text Image slides only. Title is mandatory.

pfch.components.carouselslide.descriptio.sling:message: Slide for the Content Carousel which provides text and image content.

pfch.components.displayoverride.descript.sling:message: This component is used to override the default width of components.

pfch.pages.articlepage.dialog.tab.articl.sling:message: If enabled this article will be shown in a different colour as defined on the wall page.

pfch.components.articlereadingtime.descr.sling:message: The reading time shows users how long it will approximately take to read the current article

pfch.components.topratedarticles.descrip.sling:message: Renders the 5 top rated articles on the current wall

pfch.components.faqlist.description.sling:message: FAQ List which consists of FAQ Question And Answers

pfch.components.faqquestionandanswer.dia.sling:message: Image side by side with text
